mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rn, to_char(room_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as room_date,a.room_part_id,a.room_part_state,a.part_id, a.room_code,a.room_part_name,a.room_part_phone,a.room_part_card,room_typename,a.room_livetime,b.room_typeprice, to_char(ROOM_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') as ROOM_TIME from tb_room_part a join tb_roomtype b on a.room_typeid=b.room_typeid join tb_room c on c.room_code=a.room_code
and ROOM_PART_PHONE like '%'||#{ROOM_PART_PHONE}||'%'
and ROOM_PART_NAME like '%'||#{ROOM_PART_NAME}||'%'
and rownum < #{end}) t where t.rn > #{start} and room_part_state = 0
select GOODS_ID,GOODS_NAME,GOODS_PRICE from TB_GOODS where SUPP_ID in(1,3)
mapper.update: update TB_ROOM set ROOM_STATE=0 where ROOM_CODE=#{ROOM_CODE }
update tb_room_part set room_part_state=1,ROOM_SUM=#{ROOM_SUM} where PART_ID=#{PART_ID}
update TB_GOODS set GOODS_NUM = (GOODS_NUM - #{GOODS_NUM}) where GOODS_ID=#{GOODS_ID}
mapper.select: select a.room_state, a.room_code,b.room_typename,b.room_typeprice,b.room_deposit from tb_room a join tb_roomtype b on a.room_typeid=b.room_typeid where room_state=0
select count(*) from tb_room where room_state=0
mapper.update: update tb_room set room_state=2 where room_code=#{room_code}
